---
title: "Chisq-Results-Processor"
format: html
---

I will begin by loading three things.  

1. the data that were stored from creating the batch file.

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(jsonlite)
library(tidyverse)
load("rchisq-3.RData")
```

2. The queries

```{r}
Chisq3Call <- stream_in(file("rchisq-3-Call-Revised-1211.jsonl"))
```

3. The Results

```{r}
Chisq3Result <- stream_in(file("rchisq-3-1211_output.jsonl"))
```

## Merge the call and the result

```{r}
Chisq.3.OpenAI <- left_join(Chisq3Call,Chisq3Result)
Full.Chisq.3 <- left_join(Chisq3$params, Chisq.3.OpenAI)
```

The file is saved as `Full.Chisq.3.1211.RData`.

Put the result in the params file.

```{r}
Full.Chisq.3$Outcome <- map_chr(Chisq3$params$iter, function(x) { unlist(Chisq3Result$response$body$choices[[x]][[2]][2]) })
table(Full.Chisq.3$Outcome)
Full.Chisq.3.1211 <- Full.Chisq.3
```

```{r}
save(Full.Chisq.3.1211, file="Full.Chisq.3.1211.RData")
```
